bibl.title: Two papyri from the Archive of Mikkalos and the establishment of the bibliotheke enkteseon
bibl.seg: W. Graham Claytor, Two Papyri from the Archive of Mikkalos and the Establishment of the bibliotheke enkteseon.
bibl.note: 1. P. Lond. II, 146 descr. Declaration of Property. Karanis / Arsinoe, 6 April, 74 CE. - 2. 162a descr. Loan of Money. Karanis, June 12, 98 CE. - The Archive of Mikkalos (TM Arch 602). - The Date of the Establishment of the bibliotheke enkteseon.
